mapper.select: select count(mid) from jstoreVo where mainlocal LIKE "%${mapFindStr}%" and sublocal LIKE "%${storeFindStr}%" and storeName LIKE "%${findStore}%"
select * from jstoreVo where mainlocal LIKE "%${mapFindStr}%" and sublocal LIKE "%${storeFindStr}%" and storeName LIKE "%${findStore}%" limit ${startNo}, ${listSize}
mapper.insert: insert into orders(mid, phone, address, ordertime, totalprice, howtopay, ordermenu) values(#{mid},#{phone},#{address},DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'),#{totalprice}, #{howtopay}, #{ordermenu} )
